extendedInfo.description: Critical - Medical Guide aims to assist by providing crucial medical guidelines, emergency medical references & materials, not only when the situation and details are vital, but also for students and professionals to use as medical reference material when needed. Critical - Medical Guide also features images, diagrams, language audio and interactive videos in high-definition to teach what to look for in real life.Critical - Medical Guide contains detailed medical guidelines, including: â¢ Critical Care & Course of Actionâ¢ Emergency Medicineâ¢ Interactive EKG Moviesâ¢ Medical Spanish with Audioâ¢ First Aid Care â¢ Drug Calculatorsâ¢ Formulary & Drug Interaction Checkingâ¢ Pediatric Advanced Life Supportâ¢ Ventilator Managementâ¢ Special Procedures, such as CTs and X-raysâ¢ Monitoring Information - Electrocardiograms & IABPsâ¢ Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS)â¢ Videos & Imagery to Assist in the Critical Care, and much more.All medical staff, including doctors, nurses, paramedics, EMTs and support staff will benefit from having this fundamental medical material â while on-the-go or in a medical facility. Staff and students in the medical field will also benefit from this app because it will become a Critical tool in their practices and studies.Get Critical - Medical Guide Today!

reviews.title: Must have for Field Practitioners
reviews.comment: Very handy app: does RSI meds, drug formulary, and EKGs. As a street paramedic, I use and highly recommend this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app!
reviews.comment: As a full time hospital based and field medic, this app is very useful to me. The offline capabilities assure i have full access whenever and wherever i need it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App out there
reviews.comment: Awesome App. Every ALS provider should try this. Easy to use when time matters. Educational also.
reviews.author: Roger Horton

reviews.title: Not as useful as you think
reviews.comment: Very limited information! Nothing about chest tube maintenence! Only certain drugs are available to check for iv compatibility. Not very convenient for a critical care RN. Would like a refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good application
reviews.comment: Very good application, problem it freezes. Dark screen when you want to zoom images. Can\'t exit,
reviews.author: cafen galapi

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Lots of great information readily accessible.  Nice work!
reviews.author: Jason Grimsman

reviews.title: Paul uk
reviews.comment: A reasonably good ap for the beginner but I was disappointed in the leave of info. Would like a refund please.
reviews.author: Paul Scott

reviews.title: DROID RAZR Maxx
reviews.comment: Very good for pre hospital providers. Critical Care transports this is very helpful with all the drug calculators especially the ones you don\'t transport all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very helpful and covers a broad range of information. I love how the pediatric section is setup and the RSI tab is amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mega like!
reviews.comment: I\'m a critical care transport nurse, and this app is going to be INVALUABLE to my practice! Highly recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not organized
reviews.comment: This app is more pretty cover than book. Not well organized.
reviews.author: David Vance
